text: @realDonaldTrump @POTUS look, I may not agree with how our president is handling this coronavirus situation, but he is our leader and I will defend to the death his right to be impeached, removed from office, arrested, stripped of his wealth, tried for his crimes and thrown straight the fuck into prison
